titles.title: SF305 Low in the grave He lay

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Low in the grave He lay
Jesus, my Saviour!
Waiting the coming day-
Jesus, my Lord!

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Vainly they watch His bed-
Jesus, my Saviour!
Vainly they seal the dead-
Jesus, my Lord!

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Death cannot keep His prey-
Jesus, my Saviour!
He tore the bars away
-Jesus, my Lord!

verse.name: c1
